text: welcome to this demonstration where we
will explore how organizations can
leverage Amazon services such as Amazon
Sage maker jumpstart and AWS Marketplace
Foundation models like stable diffusion
by stability AI to generate images for a
restaurant and animal adoption website
EDB best Marketplace offers various
Foundation models for textto text and
text to images which customers can
employ to address their specific
business use
cases let's dive into the steps involved
in this demonstration first we will use
Amazon Sage maker jumpstart in
conjunction with stability AI stable
Fusion to create and store the images in
Amazon simple storage system or S3
subsequently we will initiate a process
through ads lamba to update both
websites with the newly created images
once the websites have been updated an
email notification will will be
dispatched containing URLs for the
website finally we will visit the
updated website to observe the new
images in
action let's kick off the first step we
will leverage Amazon Sage maker jump
start where we will use a Jupiter
notebook that has been configured to
work with stable diffusion by stability
AI once we execute the cell to create
the images we'll see the images being
created and at the same same time these
images are being stored in Amazon simple
storage system or S3 later on we'll
execute a lamba to take the images and
update the web page as we scroll down we
see the images for the restaurant menu
being
created and we'll also see the images
for the pet adoption site being created
also bear in mind that the notebook is
sending a prompt to the foundation model
which in turn will create and display
and save the images for both website as
we scroll down we can see the last
couple of images for the pet adoption
website that has been created again all
that was needed to create these images
was to send the right prompt to the
foundation
model moving on to the next step I will
set in motion a process by ads lamba to
refresh both websites with their
recently generated images after the
website has been successfully updated an
email notification will be dispatched
including the updated
URLs the website has been updated and
the notification has been sent let's
take a look in the final step we will
utilize the links provided in the email
to visit the updated websites and
witness the incorporation of the new
images we'll Begin by exploring the
restaurant website and then proceed to
the pet adoption website
here's the restaurant website as we can
see the new images have been updated and
now let's take a look at the pet
adoption website here we can also see
the new images for the pet adoption
website has been completed
also I manually initiated the steps to
create the image and the lamba to update
the website and send a
notification but it's worth nothing that
automation is also a viable option what
you've just witnessed is a demonstration
of the dynamic image generation process
using Amazon sagemaker jumpstart in
collaboration with stability AI stable
defusion we initiated the image creation
process followed by the website update
facilitated by ads lamba and concluded
by observing the enhanced website thank
you for watching and now it's your turn
to give it a
try
